ingredients: +   1/2 teaspoon olive oil, 3 cups pecans, 20  pitted dates,   +   1/4 cup agave nectar, 6  ripe persimmons, 2 tablespoons chopped pecans, 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon, for garnish
